description:
"A mid-19th century German map of mainland Southeast Asia showing a mixture of ancient kingdoms (e.g. Birma, Siam, Anam) and the colonial possessions of Britain (Malaya, Straits Settlements) and Denmark (Nicobar Islands).
"
title: "Hinterindien : dem Sir Francis Hamilton; M.D., F.R.S. Lond. & Edin. and F.A.S. Calcutta & Lond. zum Anerkenntniss seiner grossen Verdienste um die Kunde des Indo-chinesischen Halbinsellandes gewidmet vom Verfasser"
